name: Stress Test (RavenLr, Emanuele Toscano, Rosfras, CrazYBear)
name_original: Stress Test (RavenLr, Emanuele Toscano, Rosfras, CrazYBear)
description:
Stress test is a puzzle game with restrictive rules incrementing for every level you play, can you remember them all and complete the stress test with your robot?

To play the game after downloading it: open the "index.html" file

Design: Matteo Breda, Lorenzo Barbera

Art: Rosanna Frasca

Programming: Alessio Conforto

Music & sounds: Emanuele Toscano
